com.company

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card class implements the functionality a standard playing card in a game of Badass BlackJack by storing and managing its appropriate value/suit. Created by Tyler Tiedt on 4/17/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Parameterized constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int v,
            int s)
        Parameterized constructor. Sets this cards value and suit accordingly
        Parameters:
        v - This card's value (0 - 12)
        s - This card's suit (0 = clubs; 1 = spades; 2 = diamonds; 3 = hearts)

      • getIsUsed

        public boolean getIsUsed()
        Simple getter for if this card has been used (in its current deck)
        Returns:
        true if this card has been 'dealt' false otherwise

      • setIsUsed

        public void setIsUsed(boolean x)
        Simple setter for if this card has been used (in its current deck)
        Parameters:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Function to output this card as a string. Outputs value and suit of this card as a string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Value and suit of this card as string in form " [VALUE] of [SUIT] "
